content: गोलः, --ला, --लं [गुड् अच् डस्य लः] {@--1@} {1} A ball, globe; <ls>Māl. 7. 1.</ls> {@--2@} The celestial or terrestrial globe. {@--3@} A circle. {@--4@} A sphere, anything round or globular. --लः {@--1@} A widow's bastard; <ab>cf.</ab> कुंड. {@--2@} The conjunction of several planets or the presence of several in one sign. {@--3@} Myrrh. --ला {@--1@} A wooden ball with which children play. {@--2@} A large globular water-jar. {@--3@} Red arsenic. {@--4@} Ink. {@--5@} A woman's female friend. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Godāvarī.
